attributes.action: Equalise State Pension for all. Men and women b before 6.4.1951/53 get  25% less
attributes.additional_details:
Because it is extremely unfair. In any case the expense of administering this complex
System is a waste of money. Give the same State Pension to all. Even the New Pension is far less than those provided in EU countries
attributes.background: Debate this and sort it out. I think it breaches the Equality Act

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614050
